name: Novel-19
description:
This my son and I's very first Game Jam AND first game we've been able to work on together as we're both still very very new! It's not perfect and we ran out of time and had to scrap a lot of work, but overall we learned a lot! This was a great experience and provided some forced education for sure! We're already looking forward to the next one. We both realize this isn't exactly a home run, but at least it got completed enough to submit. Thanks for putting this Game Jam on!

The theme was "Out of Control" and this was our take on it given our limited skillset.
